description.en:
Kodaira had a certain ability. It was the power to hear the inner thoughts of people around him. However, he has gotten quite tired of hearing the inner voices of the people around him, which got way too noisy after the growth of his ability.

On one such day, Ayane Hibino, the girl sitting next to him, was chatting with a female friend during break time, when the supposedly sleeping Kodaira began hearing her inner thoughts: "He's the type of guy who seems the most dangerous." and "I bet he doesn't have any friends." which were all badmouthing him. Hearing the things he didn't want to hear the most caused his stress to reach its limits, and he angrily screamed in his head "Enough! Shut up already!", which caused Ayane to be quiet.

At that moment, certain feelings he's never had before started rushing through his entire being. Kodaira, who has obtained the power to transmit his thoughts to his target, used his newfound power to make Ayane do things like: take her classes without wearing a bra under her uniform, expose her panties for others to see, and ultimately get manipulated by him in whatever way he wished.

Finally, Kodaira moves on to the next step of his plan after school that day. Inside an empty classroom, he and Ayane will...

(Source: FANZA)
